name: Waveslash
description:
What is it?

Waveslash is a 2D local multiplayer platformer fighting game.

Play with up to 4 other players in this fast-paced, simple-to-learn fighter. Dash your opponents to pieces and be the last square standing to win!

Features:

  • 4 Player Local Multiplayer
  • Singleplayer Arcade Mode
  • Break the Targets Mode
  • XBox Controller support
  • 4 Unique Stages
  • CPU Opponents

How to Play (Controls Customizable):

Dash Attack - Left Mouse / Right Control Stick 

Jump - Right Mouse / Left Trigger

Move - WASD / Left Control Stick

Parry - Spacebar / Right Trigger

Pause - Escape / Start

Dash attack to deal damage to your opponent. Parry to counter an incoming attack. Last player standing wins the round. First person to reach a certain number of rounds wins the match.
